contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 5, 1959 D Galashiels Contest
Galashiels Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
galashiels-contest
None
Old Gala House Grounds, Galashiels, Selkirk March contest - 1st Hawick, 2nd Galashiels. Best soloist - Norman Walker (Hawick). Best section 2 band - Dalkeith Burgh. Best section 3 band - Peebles Burgh. Best section 4 band - Liddlesdale.
May 5, 2014, 10:25 a.m. May 5, 2014, 10:31 a.m.
1 Hawick Saxhorn Band James Amos
2 Galashiels Town Robert Stein
3 Dalkeith Burgh Robert Gray
4 Broxburn Public Band Harry Holwill
Unknown Result Liddesdale Temperance H. B. Hutchison
Unknown Result Peebles Burgh Silver James Amos
